summary: Self-taught with 4+ years of experience using JavaScript to create UI, data visualizations and animations and is familiar with tools like ReactJS.
Having Open Source project contribution experience on a over 3k stars project — Goby Lang.
Given two public speeches about Open-Source project development and Frontend related topics

speeches.title: Travel Through Timeline - Realizing Graceful User Experience
speeches.description: Introducing Observable and using RxJS to implement simple but graceful UX mechanism.

speeches.title: Welcome the Brand New Ruby-Like Language - Goby
speeches.description: Introducing an open-source project - Goby programming language implemented by Golang.

education.location: National Taiwan University of Science and Technology, Taipei/Taiwan
